channel.title: History?
channel.description: well ive been around this community here and there and was wondering if anyone had a history of how private servers originated, i guess i am just suddenly curious?

item.title: History?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

late '05 - kaitneiks - wL server made to test bots for actual RS, was leaked and released, few people made servers from it.
early '06 - kaitneiks gone, mitb started this site.
mid '06 - main server was cheezscape, fuckton of faggots started to get wind of it all
mid-late '06 - 9999999 shitty servers created by everyone and their mums, few larger servers stand out and last for a while, most close after a week. mitb and mscp split to two sites.
early '07-now -

thats all there really is to know

Read full topic

item.title: History?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“ModSeth, post:19, topic:298602”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=394990.msg2936680#msg2936680 date=1251599625]

The only people in this thread who have any knowledge of the history of private servers, firsthand anyways, is Lin and I, and we weren’t even there from the beginning.

The only people who would know that are still active here are either vet’s older vets, or Silabsoft, MITB, and a few other globals like Taharok, etc.

Here is some history:

Kaitneks etc… (not expanding)
mitb etc… (not expanding)

the first “server” was where when you played, items spawned and you where flying.

wL Made the commonly used server base WinterLove, and off of that came a decently playable server blakescape by blakeman(randomnumbershere)

Then, (somewhere around here) MITB split into two forums. and ‘moparscape’ began the biggest name in RSPS.

In the near future from then we received DeltaScape. and we hurled into a new age, the one I would like to call the “pre-moparscapien” age.
This is where after deltascape and similar sources where released, and ever person to play a private server, needed to have their own.
So they came to the website they knew had to do with RSPS, MoparScape.

Somewhere in 2007-2008 (dont really know or care.) the Silabsoft web-client was released, and used and used…
Some people even refereed to ‘servers’ as ‘Silab Servers’ and items as ‘silab items’

Then more stabler frameworks for runescape emulators were developed, none of them are used.

And now we are in the age I would like to call “Pro-Moparscapien”.
Where even though we have more developed server emulators, they are RARELY/NEVER used.
99% of the servers in the ‘downloads section’ are wL, the people that make quality runescape server emulators do not release them.

p.s I don’t fucking know why I typed all that, just be thankful I did please.
[/quote]

I Don’t See Dodian On That? D:[/quote]
/facepalm

Read full topic

In the near future from then we received DeltaScape. and we hurled into a new age, the one I would like to call the “pre-moparscapien” age.
This is where after deltascape and similar sources where released, and ever person to play a private server, needed to have their own.

Some people even refereed to ‘servers’ as ‘Silab Servers’ and items as ‘silab items’

Then more stabler frameworks for runescape emulators were developed, none of them are used.

And now we are in the age I would like to call “Pro-Moparscapien”.
Where even though we have more developed server emulators, they are RARELY/NEVER used.
99% of the servers in the ‘downloads section’ are wL, the people that make quality runescape server emulators do not release them.

p.s I don’t fucking know why I typed all that, just be thankful I did please.[/quote]

item.title: History?
item.dc:creator: @Tree_Climber Tree_Climber
item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

qw3rty:

well ive been around this community here and there and was wondering if anyone had a history of how private servers originated, i guess i am just suddenly curious?

a guy named wL was trying new ways of testing his bots without the risks.(if i remember correctly) so he wrote a server. he released POC(Proof of concept) servers being the original rs2 server and then blakescape d-boosted. then people decided to work on the shitty POC server wL wrote. And it developed into this shit.

Read full topic
